q: "Infighting' at CPAC Kyle Drennen| February 11, 2011| 12:09 During a report on Friday's CBS Early Show, congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes emphasized division in the new Republican Congress: The prospect of a mutiny had sent Republican leaders scrambling to craft an even leaner budget, and make good on their promises to the Tea Party... Just this week, small groups of conservatives defeated two of their own party's measures on the House floor. Nancy Cordes went on to highlight tensions at the Conservative Political Action Conference in Washington: " Dick Cheney and former Defense Donald Rumsfeld were booed by one faction of attendees. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . had no legal claim to it. The SCA, which Zahi Hawass heads, said in an email that its request had been approved by both Prime Minister Nazif and the Egyptian ministry of culture. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Copyright 2011 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. If successful, Katie Price would join Louis Walsh , Dannii Minogue and Cheryl Cole on the show and Simon Cowell 's ex-girlfriend and show mentor Sinitta thinks she will be a great choice. Comment on this Article She said: Having Katie Price on the panel would make interesting viewing, so I can definitely see it working. She can do anything she puts her mind to. She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid- faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .
